resources.string: We need to verify your email address. We sent an email to *******@gmail.com with a 6 digit code that will expire in 15 minutes. Please enter the code below.
Did not get the e-mail? Check your junk or spam folders.

(Monthly 1,54 USD for 12 months. More than 15% discount)

By choosing the monthly or annual subscription button below, you agree to start your membership immediately and to cancel the contract and get a refund within the first 14 days as long as you do not access the digital content on the Disney+ Service. You will be charged a monthly or annual fee on a recurring basis. You can cancel your subscription at any time, effective from the end of the billing period. No refunds or credits are given for partially used months or years.
Yes! I would like to receive special offers and updates of products related to Disney+ and other products and services of the Walt Disney Group of Companies via email

Disney will use your data to personalize and improve your Disney plus experience, as well as to send you information about Disney+. You can change your communication preferences at any time. You may use your data as described in the Privacy Policy, including the Walt Disney Group of Companies. By clicking "Continue" you acknowledge that you have read the Privacy Policy, Cookies Policy and EMEA Privacy Rights.

Disney+ Membership Agreement

Turkiye

Last Update: 1 May 2022

DISNEY DTC EM LIMITED ("Disney+", "we", "we", "our") gives you great pleasure from participating in the Disney+ Service. "The Disney+ Service includes the Disney+ website, its business, related content and services are comprehensive.

PLEASE READ THIS MEMBERSHIP AGREEMENT ("DISNEY+ MEMBERSHIP AGREEMENT OR "AGREEMENT") CAREFULLY BEFORE USING THE DISNEY+ SERVICE.THIS AGREEMENT SHALL APPLY ONLY FOR YOUR USE OF THE DISNEY+ SERVICE. YOUR USE OF OTHER DISNEY SERVICES AVAILABLE AFTER CREATE A DISNEY+Account SUBJECT TO THE WALT DISNEY COMPANY TERMS OF USE AT WWW.DISNEYTERMSOFUSE.COM

When you click "Continue" during the Disney+ registration process or use a different industry standard mechanism, you have accepted the Disney+ Membership Agreement and are not authorized to use any of the Disney+ Service. By using any element of the Disney+ Service, you are confirming your agreement. If you do not accept the Disney+ Membership Agreement, you may not use the Disney+ Service. You must comply with and agree to abide by our reasonable instructions and terms regarding your use of the Disney+ Service and Disney+ Content. We may make changes to this Agreement, including the pricing of the Disney+ Service. important changes,It will be effective at least thirty (30) days after we give you notice (and we may also share details of changes made to the Disney+ Service).
By clicking "Accept and Continue", you agree to the Membership Agreement.
Use at least 6 characters (case sensitive) containing 2 of the following character types: letters, numbers, special characters
